name: Ahu-Nixta Mechanon
description: The Ahu-Nixta Mechanon is a Medium-sized construct with a strong physical presence, exhibiting notable combat proficiency and unique restorative capabilities. Its design allows it to grapple enemies and deliver powerful sonic attacks.
memorable: Its ability to reactivate by absorbing the souls of the fallen makes it a fearsome opponent in battle, as it can rejuvenate itself if slain.
goals: Protect itself and other constructs, engage in combat, and restore allies.
relations: Can be allied with other constructs and operates independently in various environments.
environment: Typically found in construct-heavy areas or artificial constructs environments.
strengths: Immunity to poison and psychic damage; ability to grapple and incapacitate foes; can heal itself and others.
weaknesses: Very low Intelligence and Charisma, limiting strategic thinking and social interactions.
attacks: Utilizes Multiattack with either Utility Arms or a combination of Slam and Utility Arm attacks. Sonic Disruptor offers control via thunder damage.
most_powerful_ability: Soul Reactivation allows it to regain HP from the souls of deceased creatures, reviving itself after defeat.
skills: Possesses decent perception skills with a +2 bonus.
additional_information: Doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep due to its Construct Nature.
Can manipulate objects and move creatures or items telekinetically within 60 feet.
Critical Malfunction introduces a chance of being stunned by critical hits.
Can heal constructs twice a day, enhancing its support role.
Adapt Appendage allows it to swap Utility Arms, showcasing its versatility.
